definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The outer coat is wavy or curly, but never silky.
sentences.chinese: 外层披毛为波浪状或卷曲，但不能呈丝状。

sentences.english: With underwater kick, your movement should be similar to a wave.
sentences.chinese: 在水下踢腿时，你的身体动态应该如波浪一样。

sentences.english: The fish was silvery and still and floated with the waves.
sentences.chinese: 那鱼是银色的，一动不动地随着波浪浮动着。

sentences.english: Carry me on the waves to the lands Ive never seen.
sentences.chinese: 让我承载着波浪去我从未亲见的土地。

sentences.english: Most waves are caused by winds blowing over the surface of the water.
sentences.chinese: 波浪大抵都是由风吹过水面而引起的。

sentences.english: Waves could be seen splashing into city streets and over bridges.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到波浪涌入城市街区，甚至是溅到桥上。

sentences.english: He strode into the ocean, breasting the waves.
sentences.chinese: 他挺胸顶着波浪大步走进海里。

sentences.english: Another wave came, and it flipped the raft upside down.
sentences.chinese: 另一波浪头打了过来，筏子也给掀翻了。
有一次海洋学家跟踪一些波浪。

sentences.english: The March wind is fretful, fretting the languid wave into murmurs .
sentences.chinese: 三月的风躁动不安，惹得倦怠的波浪哗哗作响。

sentences.english: The waves will stand a-tiptoe to kiss your neck and whisper in your ears.
sentences.chinese: 波浪踮着脚尖亲吻你的颈脖，在你耳旁呢喃。

sentences.english: Because the mind, like the ocean waves, is constantly arising and ebbing.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们这念心时时刻刻在起波浪。

sentences.english: Submarine motion at the periscope depth, will suffer the interference that comes from waves.
sentences.chinese: 潜艇在潜望镜深度航行时，会受到来自波浪的干扰力。

sentences.english: Notice that the movement of your belly and chest rises and falls like the motion of rolling waves.
sentences.chinese: 注意，腹部和胸部的起落运动，就像翻滚的波浪。

sentences.english: And there arose a great storm of wind, and the waves beat into the ship, so that it was now full.
sentences.chinese: 忽然起了暴风，波浪打入船内，甚至船要满了水。

definition: spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
to roll up/to curl up/(of dust etc) to swirl up
variant of 捲起|卷起[juan3 qi3]
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
